The CIAM Engineer will be responsible for the implementation, customization, management of our ForgeRock solution on a full-time basis. In the role, the incumbent will be working closely with our clients and application teams to understand business requirements, define solutions/strategies and implement them. Below is a summary of tasks expected:
Working with clients to develop CIAM strategies, architectures, and implementation plans
Integrate applications to CIAM solution and conduct proof of concepts
Installation, configuration and implementation of CIAM products
API design and development for Automation Frameworks
L3 incident/problem management and assist in obtaining audit artifacts as required
The External Identity team enables the organization to securely store and manage external identities (e.g. customers and agents) and control their access to applications and services. They have implemented the ForgeRock customer identity and access management (CIAM) solution to support Prudential in this regard. It is a centralized platform to manage external identities and authentication featuring user registration, self-service account management, consent and preference management, single sign-on (SSO), multi-factor authentication (MFA), access management, directory services and data access governance.
Most notably, the key functions CIAM engineer will support the delivery of the following initiatives:
- Integration of OnePulse and other business applications to ForgeRock
- Migrate external identities to a centralized identity management system
- Improve authentication and authorization capabilities of business applications
- Enable single sign-on (SSO) to Pulse ecosystem and 3rd party services
Secure applications by enabling multi-factor authentication (MFA)
General Profile:
Development experience
Knowledge/experienced in authentication and federations technologies/concepts
Basic understanding of Identity and Access Management concepts
Identity lifecycle management
Identity data models
Access management
Knowledge/experienced in IAM/CIAM platforms (ForgeRock, Ping Identity, Okta, Sailpoint, Oracle)
Experienced in both Windows and Linux operating systems

Bachelor's degree in Information Technology / Computer Engineering / Computer Science

Knowledge/experience in authentication and federation technologies
SAML

UMA 2.0
FIDO2
Multi-factor authentication (MFA)

Comfortable working under pressure

Company Background Partior Pte Ltd
Acknowledging that the future of global payments is on the cusp of a fundamental shift, DBS, J.P. Morgan, and Temasek have developed an open industry platform to reimagine and accelerate value movements for payments, trade, and foreign exchange settlement in a new digital era, through a newly established technology company, Partior.
Designed as a global shared ledger, Partior aims to disrupt the traditional cross-border payment by leveraging on blockchain technology to reduce current frictions and latency, minimizing post transaction exception handling and reconciliation activities.
Key distinguishing features are around privacy solution, complete decentralized hosting, and consensus efficiency providing a commercial scalability which enables it to be a platform of choice for hosting multiple CBDCs and commercial bank digital currencies.
To encourage broad participation across the banking industry, Partior will be actively engaging leading banks to join the platform to establish the scale required to benefit the industry. The platform will start
There is an opening for a talented software technologist that wants to be at the forefront of technology innovation.
Key Professional Requirements
? Must have a proactive approach to spotting problems, areas for improvement, and performance bottlenecks
? Advanced understanding of one of the following Cloud Platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure)
? Familiarity with container technologies, Kubernetes, Docker, Nomad
? Proficient in one of the following languages: Python, Java, Ruby, Shell Scripting, Go
? Proficient in CI/CD and Devops processes
? Has a Bachelor's/Master's degree in computer science, engineering, cloud or security accreditation or equivalent industry experience.
Preferred Requirements:
? Proficient in monitoring and debugging Kubernetes
? Familiarity in frameworks such as Spring, Node.JS, React
? Familiarity with P2P network constructs in relation to Blockchain
? Familiarity Wholesale banking, clearing and settlements experience will be a plus
Key Responsibilities
Monitor and enhancing the performance of a state-of-the-art cross boarder payment platform using blockchain technology.
Be recognised as a trusted partner to our customers and other technology teams who seek to make use of the platform.
Introduce emerging technology and best practises to ensure consistent and state of the art systems are engineered.
Special responsibility for:
o Ensuring that the platform conforms to Partior's security best practises and is fully consistent with the companies design ethos.
o Measuring and optimizing system performance, with an eye toward pushing our capabilities forward, getting ahead of customer needs, and innovating to continually improve
o Provide primary operational engineering support for a large, distributed software application
o Participate in system design consulting, platform management, and capacity planning.
o Helping build the culture of likeminded technologists & professionals looking to disrupt the market.
Preferable Individual qualities
? Solution-driven: Practical and resourceful.
? Hands-on; willing and able to assist with ad-hoc requests from other teams.
? Has learning agility to keep abreast of latest technology
? Team player and works well in a team that values open communication

column7:
Life at F5 is never dull. We are constantly identifying industry trends and disruptions, then innovating to get ahead of future customer needscreating application services that help the world's leading organizations deliver their critical business apps faster and with the highest levels of flexibility, security, performance, and support.
We are looking for a Technical Recruiter to join our APCJ team. Our highly productive and innovative recruitment team uses cutting edge solutions and partners with the business to attract the best talent. If you are consultative, a creative problem solver, and have a track record of hiring, then we want to talk to you!
But our success isn't driven solely by what we do. We also care deeply about how we do it. At F5, our culture is how we live, every single day. And it's producing extraordinary resultsnot only for our customers, but also for our employees. We understand that your life is about more than just work, so we're committed to a culture that supports your whole life. We offer work/life integration programs like Freedom to Flex, dynamic employee inclusion groups, paid maternity/paternity leave, tuition assistance for professional development, a comprehensive mentoring program, rewards/recognition, and so much more. At F5, we truly do help each other thrive.
And this commitment to living our culture doesn't just exist within our offices; it extends into our communities through Global Good initiatives such as employee matching, volunteer opportunities, and the F5 Foundation. Our employees are passionate about making a difference in the world.
Position Summary:
Own and drive the full cycle recruitment strategy and results for F5.
Develop, drive, and execute comprehensive search strategies - including driving a recruitment plan which is geared at building key competitive research, industry profile development, networking and direct sourcing.
Work with the HR Business Partner(s) and clients to advise on specifics for the position, including leveling/compensation strategy, immigration and market trends.
Utilize strategic advising and influencing skills; demonstrate staffing expertise and provide recommendations to hiring managers.
Serve as the talent specialist on critical recruiting initiatives craft and implement sourcing and pipeline strategy and timeline drive the dedicated talent sourcing to hire sales professionals to meet business needs.
Educate/train hiring managers and Sr Management on recruiting processes, use of recruiting software systems, compliance requirements and hiring manager best practices.
Design and provide on-going training to managers on hiring/interviewing practices and procedures, with focus on interviewing techniques and EEO/OFCCP/Sarbox compliance.
Mentor, provide training, and encourage knowledge share and teamwork with fellow recruitment teammates and HR Partners.
Deliver results with little supervision and effectively handle multiple projects and candidates.
Meet standard measurements of success for staffing, including (but not limited to recruitment metrics, annual hiring plan, diversity goals, and cost/time to hire standards.
Qualifications:
Bachelor's degree in related field or equivalent work experience required.
5 to 8 years of experience working in end to end Recruiting
3+ years of recruiting Sales, Pre-sales, GTM professionals
Direct experience at organizations in the following areas of technology is a plus: Application Delivery/Software Defined Networks, Cloud Applications, and/or Security.
Proven experience and passion toward targeting high-producing talent skill sets; ability to creatively find top talent using advanced search techniques, passive sourcing, social media, personal network, referrals, and the internet.
Full-cycle recruiting experience is required with a proven ability to attract, recruit and close.
Proficiency in MS Office applications, Applicant Tracking System usage, and internet candidate search techniques and tools.
Excellent communications both written and verbal required; ability to effectively communicate at various levels of the management chain.
Proven influence & leadership skills; ability to effectively collaborate, lead and drive the recruitment process with hiring managers and candidates.
F5 Networks is an equal opportunity employer and strongly supports diversity in the workplace.

DESCRIPTION

Job summary
As a Program Manager in Amazon Web Services (AWS) Talent Acquisition (TA), you'll be responsible for working with the TA leadership team to drive region-wide initiatives to optimize and accelerate hiring. This role partners closely with the AWS TA and business leaders, HR partners, and other internal teams to build scalable mechanisms to attract and hire the best talent while delighting applicants and constantly improving the candidate experience. This individual will establish metrics to measure the success of regional programs and track performance, sharing best practices regionally and globally.
The ideal candidate:

. Has experience working in a TA function, and understands the mechanics of recruitment
. Is independent, creative, and self-driven, with the ability to work in a highly ambiguous environment with minimal guidance, demonstrating good judgment.
. Possesses strong project and program management capabilities.
. Possesses strong teamwork, problem-solving, and execution skills
. Is a builder this is a new function within the team, with limitless opportunities to create and experiment.
. Is creative, analytical, and customer-obsessed (i.e. thinks about the needs of TA team, employees, and the business)
. Can effectively prioritize and navigate competing requests from a variety of stakeholders and customer groups.
. Is able to earn trust and influence others to drive actions relies heavily on influence not authority to drive teams and resources toward project goals and outcomes
. Has experience working in more than one country/market
. Has exceptional writing and communications skills.
. Is attentive to details and insists on the highest standards
. Is able to operate in a lean, fast-paced, entrepreneurial, multi-cultural environment

BASIC QUALIFICATIONS

. 2+ years of Program/Project Management Experience Exceptional project and program management skills can teach and coach these skills in others but also acts as a productive hands-on PM

. Structured thinking and strong analytical skills can work with data and also identity root causes, recognize patterns, and solve problems

Work closely with DevOps to build frameworks and tools pipeline, define standards (e.g. REST API), improve overall efficiency of the development (e.g. CI/CD toolchain), hygiene of the code repository (e.g. GitHub), and manage the change & release process of deployments, upgrades and migrations.
Requirements:
Preferably 2 years of professional software development experience.
Less experienced and/or fresh graduates with a flair and passion in backend software engineering will be considered for the junior role.
Good knowledge of software engineering and best practices including coding standards, code reviews, source control management, build processes, testing, and operations for scalable, multi-tenancy and high-volume solutions.
High proficiency with using Java, Python, Django, Node.js, and comfortable with bash scripts on Linux-based systems, and using AWS (EC2, CloudFormation, CloudWatch, RDS, ECS etc.) is necessary.
Extensive experience with Docker, container management, SQL databases and REST API service integration.
Good understanding of OWASP security practices is a plus.
An ability to perform in a fast-paced, multi-time zone environment.

column7:
Aruba Regional Consulting System Engineer - EdgeConnect
This role has been designated as Edge, which means you will primarily work outside of an HPE office.
Job Description:
Hewlett Packard Enterprise advances the way people live and work. We bring together the brightest minds to create breakthrough technology solutions, helping our customers make their mark on the world.

Aruba is redefining the IT EDGE. Creating new customer experiences by building intelligent spaces and digital workspaces. We are focused on campus, branch, mobility and the IoT to transform business models with the combined power of compute, context, control and secure connectivity.
The position, Consulting Systems Engineer (CSE) is to provide technical leadership, training and mentoring and product expertise to Aruba Sales and Technical team in South East Asia Taiwan and Hong Kong region. You will work in partnership with Aruba EdgeConnect regional sales teams, which includes systems engineers, channel managers and territory sales managers to develop and accelerate EdgeConnect and SD-Branch business. Must be accountable for revenue targets by providing support on opportunities directly with partners and sales teams. Oversee enablement programs to ensure partners are technically trained and capable of identifying and supporting opportunities. Act as a trusted advisor for all things Aruba with a specific focus on Aruba EdgeConnect SD-WAN. Travel will be +50% primarily focused on supporting HQ and field offices.
Must have:
Technical skills on Software Defined Wide Area Network (SDWAN) domain
Hands-on experience in SDWAN solutions like SilverPeak, Cisco Viptela, Cloudgenix, Versa or similar product line
Technical certifications like SPSP, SPSX or similar SDWAN certifications
As CSE will support field enablement activities for Aruba's EdgeConnect and SD-Branch products and solutions, including aspects of design, deployment and troubleshooting these solutions. The CSE will also be the technical expert or have familiarity with other components of the Aruba solution portfolio such as network management, switching, WLAN, Cloud and Data Centre.
Drive the inclusion of various bleeding-edge demos in the Executive Briefing Center (EBC) experience. Actively engage in various Aruba events like sales kick-offs, Aruba Atmosphere, TSS etc. to conduct live demos as well presentation/training sessions for partners and customers
Generating technical collateral which includes reviewing and producing technical application notes, configuration, and design guides, and assist in curriculum and training development when required
Review and development of white papers, technical briefs, and implementation documents for publication on the web and printed media. Participate in and support technical forums, industry events, and other speaking events and industry shows. Also participate in customer site visits, especially those involving product/feature demonstrations.
Develop and deliver complex technical presentations to various-size sales teams, C-level executives, customer audiences and industry forums
Provide enablement training, pre-sales support, and installation preparedness training for Aruba Local teams in the SEATH region.
Work in conjunction with the rest of the Aruba regional and global teams to contribute and develop content for existing and new webinars and workshops.
Work other Aruba local teams to increase their win rate, increase revenue, and increased technical certifications.
Deliver technical trainings, pre-sales presentations and demonstrations to partners and customers to deepen their knowledge in the product and keep them updated on the latest features
Manage and own all technical aspects of the technical sales cycle when supporting partners in their own opportunities
You will provide prompt feedback to and be ready to aid product management and engineering on future direction of the product.
You will travel to trade shows, marketing events.
You will participate in discussion with marketing and engineering teams on new product introduction and provide feedback
Education and Experiences:
First level university degree with a focus in computer science or equivalent degree
Atleast 5+ years of experience as a pre-sales Systems/Sales Engineer
You have formal network training and certifications that are required specifically in areas of routing (CCNP, CCIE, JNCP, JNCIE) or extensive experience designing and supporting complex enterprise networks
Well recognized industry certifications such as ACMX/ACCX/ACSX/ACDX
About you:
You are an expert in enterprise routing on both the LAN and WAN, specifically with protocols such as BGP and OSPF. You have working knowledge of how these protocols operate, and how they are configured in enterprise networks. You will need to provide expertise throughout the sales and deployment cycle working with CCIE level routing problems
You have network design experience that allows you to understand how the entire LAN and WAN architecture is setup and deployed. You will need to have a deep understanding of how packets move through a network, and the design decisions that come along with that
You have a solid understanding of legacy networks and how to interoperate with them through the transition to SD-WAN
You are able to own the room in network design discussion and whiteboard sessions
You have a strong understanding and working knowledge of VRF, VLAN, IP Subnetting, IPV4 and IPV6, network protocols such as TCP and UDP, access control lists and other surrounding areas
You have a working knowledge of network firewalls and other security services often found in networks
You have recent experience using the CLI on major router and switch vendors
You are able to present to an audience of mixed roles and technical abilities within an organization
You have troubleshooting skills that include hands-on experience with the configuration of networking gear
You have working knowledge of the installation and configuration of virtual machines on major hypervisors (VMware, Hyper-V, KVM and Xen)
You have competent troubleshooting skills on the installation and configuration of hypervisors and operating systems
You have experience working with cloud solutions such as AWS, Azure, Google and Oracle Cloud and a curiosity to grow your level of expertise in this domain
You have understanding of cloud networking principals such as VPC, Transit Gateway, Azure Virtual WAN, Direct Connect, Express Route and other vendor specific technologies
You have internal drive and positive attitude to go above and beyond whenever necessary to compete and win business
You are a team player willing to jump in and roll up your sleeves
You are highly organized with solid project management skills
You take detailed notes and adequately document customer requirements and environment details
You are someone who is curious and is always learning new technologies
You have the ability to present to a large audience or group of people
You are able to occasionally work nights and weekends around customer schedules
You are calm under pressure in high stakes, mission critical customers and environments
Join us and make your mark!

We offer:
A competitive salary and extensive social benefits
Diverse and dynamic work environment
Work-life balance and support for career development

Job Description :

This Renewal Sales Manager position will be responsible for executing on the sales strategy related to any perpetual and/or subscription renewals, including maintenance, on-premise, SaaS and cloud solutions that are in the assigned territory. As Renewal Sales Manager you will also be responsible for working with the renewal sales reps to identify and execute upsell strategies at the point of renewal. What will you do . Managing the different facets of subscription and support renewals . Preparing the renewal letters, quotations, invoices, and notifications . The Tech Lead will report to Vice President, Ships Agency Next.
Who you are:
You will be responsible for connecting the functional organization needs with technology, driving technical discussions with external and internal partners and ensure the development of flexible, reusable and scalable components to support the organizations objectives and needs. This includes architectural fit of application and services, integration capabilities and processes, evaluating data analytics opportunities, be a driving force for a modern service layer architecture and take lead on technical due diligence processes. The Tech Lead has an important role in communicating the visions, strategy, and objectives to lead, guide and inspire the organization. You will be engaging with external partners but also collaborate closely with Ships Agency IT director and all functional areas within both WSS SA and Wilhelmsen as large as required.
Required experience and skills:
University degree, minimum bachelor's degree, in technology, programmingor similar fields. Relevant experience can compensate for a lack of formal education.
A cloud-first mindset and strong believer in DevOps and Agile practices.
Experience with and understanding of one or more modern technology concepts such as
o Decoupled design
o Microservice architecture
o Event sourcing and delivery
o Domain driven design
Programming experience and background.
Understanding broader application architecture, technical decisions and organizational dependencies.
Leadership skills within IT to develop and give clear direction to teams, and more broadly to advise and influence other stakeholders acrossthe business.
Strategic and visionary attitude and mindset, able to translate business strategies and demands into capabilities and service deliveries.
Experience with designing and developing scalable and high-performing integrations using Microservices architecture and decoupled design.
Excellent technical, diagnostic, and troubleshooting skills.
A sound ability to understand different needs and how to develop appropriate solution.
Proven ability to influence, develop and motivate people to change behaviour, both internal and external audiences.
Team player, able to help others and contribute where necessary.
Global mindset and knowledge of the maritime industry preferred.
Excellent communication skills.
Ability to deliver results and go the extra mile when required to create superior results.
Ability to run teams and navigate in a complex environment.
Willing to travel.
Trust in the Wilhelmsen group's vision of shaping the maritime industry.
What you will be doing:
Understanding strategic business objectives and specific upcoming needs and initiatives across the rest of the organization.
Initiate and oversee strategic projects to continuously modernize the application and integration environment.
Take ownership of technical discussions with external and internal partners.
Determine project requirements and developing work schedules for the team
Identifying risks and forming contingency plans as soon as possible.
Keeping up-to-date with industry and technology trends and developments.
Be an internal ambassador and ensure close co-operation and alignment with product teams, digital projects, and external partners, including involvement in relevant projects and forums.
Represent Ships Agency Next on the Ships Agency Service Layer board/committee.
Monitor the maritime start-up landscape at large and actively engage in partnership and investment opportunities.
Recognize business and monetization opportunities through digital channels and services.
Take an active role in driving technical due diligence in relations to investment processes.
Guide, support and contribute to delivering modern digital services to the organization.
Champion a modern Cloud-first and DevOps mindset.
Sounds interesting If you can see yourself in this role, please let us know why you are our new Tech Lead.

column7:
Seeking a candidate who is responsible for the engineering and management of critical security monitoring infrastructure and services across the enterprise. This includes the management of core security products and infrastructure components across domains including Application & Host Security, Infrastructure Defense, Vulnerability Assessments, and Cloud Security. Additionally, the candidate is expected to work closely with our Security Operations Center to deliver comprehensive planning, monitoring, and operations solutions to identify, analyze, and respond to threats targeting the organization. As a subject matter expert, the candidate is also expected to identify opportunities to improve security monitoring architecture and capabilities, designing and driving changes to meet corporate and regulatory requirements to achieve targeted goals.
The candidate shall have the demonstrated ability to think strategically about business and operation challenges and possess a keen eye for control improvement through innovative use of technology. He or she should also have customer-facing skills that will allow them to manage both internal and external customers well, drive discussions with senior management, and a sound technical background to engage the Technology teams.
Reporting directly to the Vice President, Security Design & Engineering, the candidate shall:
Act as central point of contact to coordinate and/or in support of (but not limited to) strategic planning, business interactions and escalations, technology implementations and migrations, issue resolutions, incident/problem management representation.
Oversee the end-to-end life cycle of technology implementation and execute the on-boarding of new and existing security solutions into company's security infrastructure.
Integrating and developing security monitoring use cases, including but not limited to, insider threat, data exfiltration, cyber threat, cloud and application security, and suspicious activity monitoring; which will include an understanding of attacks through attack trees, recognizing threats via indicators.
Capturing and articulating business requirements for security monitoring to the respective vendors content creation team.
Educate and advise business and technical leaders on the development, delivery and management of security monitoring solutions.
Responsible for the engineering/re-engineering and oversight of operational and business processes and documentation while developing measurement and improvement processes to continuously drive service maturity.
Periodically evaluate existing systems and capabilities to ensure effectiveness.
Experience and qualifications:
4+ years of experience in administration or use of cyber security products such as SIEM, security analytics, vulnerability management, threat intelligence, security incident response, forensic investigation tools, anomaly analytics tools, etc.
Fundamental knowledge and experience with networks, firewalls, intrusion prevention systems, endpoint protection, endpoint detection and response, Hadoop data lakes, etc.
Knowledge of MITRE ATT&CK and Cyber Kill Chain methods and other similar frameworks is a must; knowledge with regular expressions, automation, and scripting is an asset.
Security certifications like CISSP, CISA, CISM, GCFA, GCIH, GCIA, GNFA, or GREM are a plus.
Demonstrate ability to operate in diverse environments and cultures and enjoys working in challenging and fast-paced environments.
Ability to provide on-call support when needed.
Good discipline in timely submission and reporting key metrics and status.
Strong communication and presentation skills to wide and diverse audiences
If you are interested in this position, please click Apply Now and we will review your qualifications & reach out to you for further discussion & next steps, if your skillsets meet the needs of the role.
Only shortlisted candidates will be responded to, therefore if you do not receive a response within 14 days please accept this as notification that you have not been shortlisted.

Acronis is dedicated not just to cyber protection but to the general protection of its potential and current employees, interviews are being held virtually during the current global COVID-19 situation.
Acronis is a world leader in cyber protectionempowering people by providing them with cutting-edge technology that enables them to monitor, control, and protect the data that their businesses and lives depend on. We are in an exciting phase of rapid-growth and expansion and looking for a Lead Cybersecurity Engineer who is ready to join us in creating a #CyberFit future and protecting the digital world!
Acronis brings complete Cyber Protection solutions, including automatic Vulnerability Assessment and Patch Management on endpoints. As Lead Cybersecurity Engineer, you will own Vulnerability Assessment and Patch Management intelligence database creation and maintenance. You will also work closely with our cyber security researchers and other automation developers
Every member of our A-Team has an instrumental role and impact on the success of Acronis innovative and growing business, so we are looking for someone who enjoys working in dynamic, global teams and thrives in a fast-paced and rapidly changing work environment. Just like everyone at Acronis, the ideal candidate will embody all of our company values: responsive, alert, detail-oriented, makes decisions, and never gives up.
WHAT YOU'LL DO
Design, develop and maintain automation pipelines for collecting information about new vulnerabilities and available patches.
Build highly scalable, robust and fault-tolerant systems.
Monitor, optimize and re-design the architecture to maximize performance of systems.
Perform automated quality assurance for developed components.
WHAT YOU BRING (EXPERIENCE & QUALIFICATIONS)
3+ years of experience as Python developer, DevOps engineer or relevant positions.
Experience in frameworks like Celery, Flask or Django, Pytest
Experience in working with SQL (PostgreSQL) or no-SQL database like MongoDB
Experience with Agile and CI/CD (continuous integration/development) tools such as Jenkins
Knowledge of virtualization environments, experience of creating and controlling virtual machines in cloud.
Knowledge of Linux system management and software deployment
Experience with Docker and Kubernetes is preferred.
Capable and willing to learn and integrate new technology (a new tool, database or programming language).
Good reading and writing English skills.
WHO WE ARE
Acronis is revolutionizing cyber protection by integrating backup, disaster recovery, storage, next-generation anti-malware, and protection management into one solution. This all-in-one integration removes the complexity and risks associated with non-integrated solutions and offers easy, complete and reliable data protection for all workloads, applications, and systems across any environmentphysical, virtual, cloud, and mobileall at a low cost.
Founded in Singapore in 2003 and incorporated in Switzerland in 2008, Acronis is truly a global organization with more than 1,900 employees in 33 locations in 18 countries. Its solutions are trusted by more than 5.5 million consumers and 500,000 businesses, including 100% of the Fortune 1000 companies. Acronis products are available through 50,000 partners and service providers in over 150 countries in more than 30 languages. Acronis is in an exciting phase of growth and expansion, recently receiving a $250 million investment from CVC Capital Partners, bringing the total valuation to more than $2.5 billion.
Acronis is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, color, marital status, national origin, physical or mental disability, medical condition, protected veteran status, race, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or any other characteristic protected by applicable laws, regulations and ordinances.

Company Background Partior Pte Ltd
Acknowledging that the future of global payments is on the cusp of a fundamental shift, DBS, J.P. Morgan, and Temasek have developed an open industry platform to reimagine and accelerate value movements for payments, trade, and foreign exchange settlement in a new digital era, through a newly established technology company, Partior.
Designed as a global shared ledger, Partior aims to disrupt the traditional cross-border payment by leveraging on blockchain technology to reduce current frictions and latency, minimizing post transaction exception handling and reconciliation activities.
Key distinguishing features are around privacy solution, complete decentralized hosting, and consensus efficiency providing a commercial scalability which enables it to be a platform of choice for hosting multiple CBDCs and commercial bank digital currencies.
To encourage broad participation across the banking industry, Partior will be actively engaging leading banks to join the platform to establish the scale required to benefit the industry. The platform will start with a focus on facilitating flows primarily between Singapore-based banks in both USD and SGD, with the intent to expand service offerings to other markets and in various currencies
There is an opening for a talented software technologist that wants to be at the forefront of technology innovation.
Key Professional Requirements
? Advanced understanding of container security, developing security content to detect threats across various container platforms and/or technologies.
? Advanced understanding of security threats relating to Cloud Platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure)
? Advanced understanding of Splunk search processing language (SPL) for developing alerting, metrics, and/or reporting of security threats.
? Experience with attacks and mitigation methods
? 5 years of relevant industry experience in Cyber security
? Proficient in one or more of the following languages: Shell Scripting, Python, Go, SQL
? Has a Bachelor's/Master's degree in computer science, engineering, cloud or security accreditation or equivalent industry experience.
Preferred Requirements:
? Penetration background
? Familiarity in frameworks such as Spring, Node.JS, React and security threats associated with these frameworks
? Familiarity with P2P network constructs in relation to Blockchain and security threats associated with these network patterns
? Familiarity with honey pot, honey wall deployments and security threat intelligence
Key Responsibilities
Provide core technical expertise and engineering capability to engineer a next generation Security Monitoring & Analytics (SMA) platform.
Implement a threat platform by defining new data models, detection strategies and security content for various threats.
Lead initiatives to develop and tune security content for various controls
Help develop a use case testing framework using scripts and adversary simulation capabilities
Introduce emerging technology and security best practises to ensure consistent and state of the art systems are engineered and are secure.
Special responsibility for:
o Ensuring that the platform conforms to Partior's security best practises and threats associated with the platform are monitored in SMA
o Develop detection strategies and security content for various threats, new and emerging
o Participate in system design, security consulting, threat intelligence and security best practises
o Helping build the culture of likeminded technologists & professionals looking to disrupt the market.
Preferable Individual qualities
? Solution-driven: Practical and resourceful.
? Hands-on; willing and able to assist with ad-hoc requests from other teams.
? Has learning agility to keep abreast of latest technology
? Team player and works well in a team that values open communication

The successful candidate will run exciting digital projects throughout their life cycles with a focus on Agile capabilities and can successfully deliver digital agenda. With a proactive approach to business issues, you will plan project requirements with key decision makers and domain specialists, handle project timeline, identify risks and communicate them clearly to all involved.
. Certified Scrum Master/ Agile Certified, experience with Agile methodology and UX development environment. Experience with focus group and workshop facilitation
. Experience with tools like Trello, Confluence and JIRA and experience with Cloud project implementation. Role includes but not limited to
o Lead development of overall project schedule & activities based on Agile methodology
o Manage service providers to ensure that their contractual responsibilities are met
o Plan and lead overall procurement activities from tender specification compilation, tendering, evaluation, recommendation and award
o Work closely with UX designers to plan and coordinate research activities such as product conceptualisation workshop and Usability Testing
o Leverage on cloud technologies for cloud-eligible systems and to adopt service design and data analytics where possible.
o Understand and interpret requirements leading to technical implementation
o Own risk management process
How To Succeed
. Degree or Diploma in Computer Science, Information Systems, Information/ Infocomm Technology, Computer or Electronics Engineering or related field.
. At least 5 years of relevant working experience as a Project Manager in at least 2 full project development life cycles, with at least one using Agile methodology.
. An adaptable and enterprising personality, with willingness to pick new knowledge and take calculated risks.
. Experience in handling projects involving Cloud or Design Thinking

column7:
About us
PALO IT is an innovation & agile development company. From Design Research to DevOps, we are in the business of end-to-end development of breakthrough digital experiences. As a community of innovators and developers, we also aim at renewing the way organizations operate, promoting sustainable business agility, user-centricity and open collaboration while having fun doing it.
Started in France in 2009 and with offices in Singapore, Australia, Hong Kong, Thailand and Mexico, we are looking for our next superstar to join our exciting team in Singapore.
At PALO IT, our employees are not widgets. They are in the center of all our projects and successes. We offer an exciting and creative working environment, with endless opportunities to develop your skills, travel and take your career to the next level. Get in touch to find out more!
Our Vision and Values
We aspire to positively impact the world by empowering organisations to harness the power of transformative technology for the greater good.
We Care about our World
We Act with Courage
We Share , it's in our DNA
We Choose Positivity
We Deliver Awesomeness
Your profile & responsibilities
YOU:
Thrive on challenge. When was the last time you failed
Are curious & always learning. What are you up to right now
Can deal with constant change. When were you last surprised
Have mastered at least one skill of your trade but you're not defined by it. What can you teach us Can you wear many hats
YOUR RESPONSIBILITIES:
The Senior/Lead Site Reliability Engineer (SRE) would develop, maintain, and support a complex modern web application while learning and applying DevOps practices. You will gain experience in the latest concepts, technologies, and modern frameworks such as Microservices, Spring Boot, React/Redux, Docker, AWS, ELK, Terraform, Ansible, and Jenkins. You would hone your experience in infrastructure-related development and activities such as maintaining the application infrastructure and respond to client requests when required will be expected.
Manage technical issues and escalations, delivering a high level of client satisfaction.
Understand and maintain production code, maintain, and support multiple applications and infrastructure.
Deep understanding of underlying infrastructure system and issues
Ability to troubleshoot production systems and self-learn new tools and technologies as per project requirements
Document and share knowledge on developed or maintained solutions.
Build understanding of a wide variety of concepts, technologies, and frameworks.
YOUR PROFILE:
Strong experience in Cloud-based and DevOps practices and technologies such as AWS/Openstack/Ansible/Terraform/ELK/Jenkins
Good understanding of microservice architecture and experience with fixing support escalation issues
Experience with maintaining and supporting cloud-related infrastructures
Working knowledge and experience with at least 1 cloud provider
Good knowledge of Unix/Linux OS, Python/Bash/Shell Scripting, and SQL
Experience with architecture to implement development-to-production workflows
Good understanding of DevOps principles (e.g. testing automation, BDD, TDD, Release automation, CI/CD, etc.)
A master's/bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related area
Excellent interpersonal, oral/written communication and cross-group collaboration skills
Independent thinker with a strong work ethic but also willing and able to conform to established architectural constraints
Detail-oriented with good organizational skills
Ability to work on multiple priorities and/or projects simultaneously
Problem-solving abilities and ability to meet reasonable deadlines
Strong team player, ability to build positive and collaborative relationships
Your role at PALO IT
You will be invited to take part in R&D works done within our Practices. You will have the chance to assist or be a speaker at must-attend international IT conferences. You will have the opportunity to write articles for our Blog or specialized press. Genuine ambassador of PALO IT, you will present our offers and take an active role in the development of the company.
If you like what you just read, we'd love to have a chat with you!
We might not be able to get back to every applicant but we promise your application will be reviewed by one of our recruitment experts.
Protecting your privacy and the security of your data are longstanding top priorities for Palo-IT.
Your personal data will be processed for the purposes of managing Palo-IT's recruitment related activities, which include setting up and conducting interviews and tests for applicants, evaluating and assessing the results, and as is otherwise needed in the recruitment and hiring processes.
Please consult our Privacy Notice (https://www.palo-it.com/en/privacy-policy) to know more about how we collect, use, and transfer the personal data of our candidates.
Here you can find how you can request for access, correction and/or withdrawal of your Personal Data

column7:
Lucence is a fast-growing precision oncology company with offices in Singapore, California, Hong Kong and Suzhou. Join our mission to fight cancer and drive the company's growth as our Data Engineer.
Key responsibilities:
Collaborating with cross-functional teams to define and gather data analysis requirements.
Improving existing data operation systems by analysing the business objectives and architecting and developing data pipelines across different platforms.
Developing and maintaining an Interactive Dashboard Interface to track and monitor the company's daily operations.
Consistently exploring, evaluating, and implementing new technologies to enhance the company's data discovery efforts.
To be a good fit for this role, you would have:
At least a Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Mathematics, Engineering, or related field.
At least 3 years of working experience in related fields and disciplines is preferred.
Fluency in data analysis programming languages, such as python, R, etc.
Fluency in relational/No-SQL databases, such as PostgreSQL, DynamoDB, etc.
Familiarity with PowerBI and/or Tableau is preferred.
Familiarity with the Python Dash framework and Cloud Technology (e.g., AWS, GCP, etc.) will be advantageous.
A fast learner who is passionate about developing data pipelines.
Prior working experience in healthcare and cancer-related fields is advantageous.
COVID-19 Vaccination Requirement: Fully Vaccinated.

Location: Jurong East (Near MRT)
Industry: German MNC Automotive Manufacturing
Salary Range: Up to $10,000.00
This is a Permanent position.
Our client is looking for highly motivated individual to join them and be part of the ITT Business Accelerator team. The incumbent will be the Digital Enabler to enable new business models, fostering innovation & enhancing current capabilities. This role allows to harmonize, synchronize, integrate, visualize, mashup, federate, analyze data to power digital transformation that can be used to develop new value added services as well as digitally enabling older technologies and applications. Enablers pioneer to build/maintain solid digital products, which are easily scalable and maintainable throughout the life cycle. Drive and support in rolling out the existing/global products to more user groups following the global strategy.
As a Digital Enabler, your main responsibilities will include the following:
Own vision and roadmap for the product and maintain the life cycle
Create/Enable an innovation area, to manage and develop new ideas to support the growing business
Knowledge on cutting edge technologies and cloud native services
Driving adoption of digital initiatives across the business units
Stay aligned and attuned to customer needs and potential changes/impacts/trends in the product space (from product generation to delivery)
Develop solutions based on customer's needs, creating user stories, preparing and performing user acceptance testing and implementing rollout management
Visualize, analyze and render the data in a presentable way to the management
Develop solutions based on customer's needs, creating user stories, preparing and performing user acceptance testing and implementing rollout management
Build and maintain stakeholder relationships, take responsibility of outcomes
Foster positive relationships, share information and able to promote health debate
Ensure adequate escalation management as part of the end-to-end service responsibility (to be clarified with TAF Partner)
Draft and perform professionalized marketing pitch
Work with Technology Domain & Innovation Architects and Portfolio Management to build stable products
Build and maintain product portfolios on intranet social media
Brainstorm new and creative growth strategies
Requirements:
Minimum 2 years relevant work experience in MS. Dynamics D365 BC , MS. Dynamics Nav 2009 and other versions.
Deep knowledge on MS. Dynamics D365 and extensive experience on its set up, upgrade, development, implementation, administration and integration
Intense drive for technological advancements and ability to make it happen
Intense passion on learning and improving his/her knowledge
Highly motivated independent worker with minimum guidance required
Ability to work in an international and intercultural context
Excellent communication skills in both written and spoken.
Qualification
Excellent knowledge in Digital processes & product strategy
Minimum 8 years of experience in IT consulting (plan/build/run) on infrastructure services
Advanced knowledge of IT (technologies, architectures, etc.)
Experience in developing Digital strategies and product development
Ability to discuss with markets and to have a product mind set
Experience in IT Service Management and knowledge of tools
Knowledge of key automation technology trends
Agile project development
Ability to make use of existing products and platforms
Excellent communication skills in both written and spoken
Good conflict management skills
Strategic, creative and innovative thinking
Strong analytical skills and data-driven thinking
Excellent details written and verbal communication skills, possibly including some user interface documentation skills
All Successful candidates can expect a very competitive remuneration package and a comprehensive range of benefits. Please submit your updated resume in Word format by using the Apply Now Button.

column7:
The Client Success Team is responsible for the Satisfaction, Retention and Growth of higher revenue clients. The Client Success Manager will turn these Clients into Emarsys advocates by understanding the Clients goals and demonstrating how our technology and services can drive business results as well as guiding our Clients to get the most out of their investment in our Client Engagement Platform.
YOUR AREA OF RESPONSIBILITIES
Own the ultimate success of a portfolio of Emarsys Clients by taking responsibility for the Satisfaction, Retention and Growth of each account.
Push to meet with senior stakeholders within each client accounts on a regular basis and drive forward client projects and create new opportunities through your intimate knowledge of your client's strategic objectives.
Identify opportunities for clients to reduce their workload through automation and deeper integration of the Emarsys platform into their marketing operations.
Work with the Senior Stakeholders of your account portfolio to understand and assess their business objectives and promote Emarsys value and ROI through adoption and usage of our solutions.
Manage and constantly improve the on-going client relationship for all of your assigned accounts by working with Technical Client Services, Professional Services and Strategic Services to deliver a best in class customer experience to all of your clients and act as the point of escalation for client-specific issues if they affect the relationship and/or revenues
Use your knowledge of digital marketing best practice and Emarsys solutions to oversee client growth and deliver a return on the clients Emarsys investment.
Use your relationships with clients to create advocacy within your portfolio to drive testimonials, case studies and references to create new business opportunities.
Take ownership of the transfer of information from Product Development, Marketing and Strategy teams to your portfolio of clients to drive upsell and cross selling opportunities and secure our long term revenue stream through the timely renewal of client contracts.
Consistently and regularly use Salesforce & other information systems to provide timely and accurate forecasting and reporting of activity.
Ensure client attendance at company events and webinars and work closely with the marketing team to deliver videos, testimonials and case studies from each of your clients.
YOUR PROFILE
Minimum 3-5 years experience in account management, preferably in digital marketing consulting, marketing cloud sales, and technology areas.
Experience working in a quota bearing role and have desire to hit your number.
Avid learner with ability to adapt to changing environment and product development.
Excellent Client management skills and strong communication & negotiation skills
A positive attitude, self-motivated, and a good team member
Strong technology skills that you are able to do complete product demonstrations and credibly discuss technical topics will be with great advantage.
Good knowledge of MS Office software.
Experience with Salesforce.com or similar CRM systems would be an advantage.
Strong in written and spoken English, another Asian language is preferred (Chinese, Thai, Bahasa etc)
Travel frequency : 20% ,around once every 2 month
WHAT WE OFFER
Regional exposure with all rounded functions to support Singapore and Southeast Asia regions.
High growth industry and with some of the most innovative products in Marketing Technology.
Collaborative and helpful teams who are supportive and will go out of their way to help you out!
Cool staff pantry with large variety of free snacks and fresh fruits delivered weekly.
DIRECT FROM OUR STAFF
I love the people I work beside. Emarsys has created a family.
I love having the freedom to experiment and fail, and still support my actions.
We all work hard and are recognized for doing so.
At Emarsys, we are committed to building diverse teams with a rich variety of perspectives and experiences. If your job profile closely aligns with our essential requirements and business need, we encourage you to apply. We are dedicated to assessing your competencies, learning agility and passion and not your age, disability, familial status, sexual orientation, gender, race, ethnicity, religion or nationality.

About Infosys:
Infosys is a global leader in next-generation digital services and consulting. We enable clients in 46 countries to navigate their digital transformation. With over three decades of experience in managing the systems and workings of global enterprises, we expertly steer our clients through their digital journey. We do it by enabling the enterprise with an AI-powered core that helps prioritize the execution of change. We also empower the business with agile digital at scale to deliver unprecedented levels of performance and customer delight. Our always-on learning agenda drives their continuous improvement through building and transferring digital skills, expertise, and ideas from our innovation ecosystem.
Visit www.infosys.com to see how Infosys (NYSE: INFY) can help your enterprise navigate your next.
Short Description:
If your passion is to build solutions that really make a difference to enterprises, the community and your world, Infosys is the right place for you.
The JD should contain the following:
1.Roles and Responsibilities:
Involved with designing and developing world-class technical solutions and demonstrating best Supply Chain Industry practices.
Work with Business Solution team and understand the business requirements and provide all possible technical/functional support.
Communicating with Client Manager and providing status on a daily basis.
Provide support to Project team during critical system availability issues, upgrades and enhancements and bug fixes impacting the business.
Requirement Management and Change Management process.
Understand the business process and provide high level design solution for the development team to provide better system solution for end users.
Well versed of working with onsite/offshore model.
Exposure to Project Management activities.
Adaptability to work with professionals having diversified backgrounds.
2.Skills /Competencies:
a.Essential Skills:
Minimum 6 to 8 years of experience as Supply chain Techno Functional Consultant in Manufacturing and Hi-Tech industry.
Must Have Strong working experience in Oracle Essbase, PL/SQL, Shell Scripting
Strong Technical knowledge in Office 365 framework.
Advanced Technical knowledge in Operational Planning Framework(Oracle Hyperion Essbase).
Techno-functional analytical skill in supply chain module using Oracle Hyperion Essbase.
Strong Business knowledge in commodity procurement.
Domain knowledge and prior techno functional experience in Planning domain for Hi-Tech Manufacturing industry.
Domain knowledge in Supply and demand planning using custom built Framework
Complete Functional experience in clear to build inventory control.
Advanced level Technical expertise must in Oracle (PL/SQL Programing), Oracle Essbase 512,
Excellent Trouble shooting and debugging skills. Should perform peer reviews and assist the team in troubleshooting.
Expertise in analyzing the client's requirements, understanding the business process and mapping it in Supply chain manufacturing.
Should follow coding standards by taking into consideration the Performance impact on system.
b.Preferred skills
Intermediate Technical skill in Angular JS, VB, O365, Python, Oracle Cloud.
c.Additional Skills:
Excellent customer interfacing skills.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Strong attention to detail and outstanding analytical and Problem-solving skills.
Infosys is an equal opportunity employer and positively encourages applications from suitably qualified and eligible candidates regardless of gender or other attribute covered by equal opportunity legislation.

Please note in order to protect the interest of all parties involved in the recruitment process, Infosys does not accept any unsolicited resumes from third party vendors. In the absence of a signed agreement any submission will be deemed as non-binding and Infosys explicitly reserves the right to pursue and hire the submitted profile. All recruitment activity must be coordinated through the Talent Acquisition department.
All aspects of employment at Infosys are based on merit, competence and performance. We are committed to embracing diversity and creating an inclusive environment for all employees. Infosys is proud to be an equal opportunity employer.

This role encompasses deployment of network services for our corporate customers. The candidate must be driven and resourceful to delight our customers to deploy network services and will work relentlessly with all relevant stakeholders to bring up the service promptly to meet the customer's expectations.
Job Responsibilities:
Provision of WAN connection services to M1 Corporate customers
Provide on-site and remote support of the installation, commissioning and troubleshooting of the networks
Perform installation of Router, Switches, Firewall, SDWAN, Access Point, SIP Trunk, DGV, network equipment, etc.
Maintain network documentation (eg. Provisioning guide, Technical Evaluation and Proof of Concept write-up, etc.)
Manage and ensure on-time delivery, follow up with internal and external teams and closure of work orders.
Support new product initiatives on CPE evaluation, Cloud, 5G, SDWAN & Security services.
Job Requirements:
Diploma in IT, Telecommunication, or any related field with minimum 3 years experience
CCNA certification would have added advantage
Minimum 3 years in Service Provider or IT related field
Familiar with Fiber Broadband Network and Data Center Exchanges in Singapore
Minimum 3 years hands-on experience to configure L2VPN, L3VPN, GRE, IPSEC, DMVPN, HSRP, GLBP, OSPF, BGP, Firewall on Cisco, Fortigate platforms are highly desired
Knowledge in data center deployment, cabling infrastructure and different network devices
Knowledge in TCP/IP, Networking, internet-working technologies, GNS3, VMs and VoIP
Fluent spoken and written English
Self-motivated, organized, work independently and a team player
Good customer service, communication and interpersonal skills
Keen to learn and explore new networking technologies

column6: Information Security  Cyber Security  Data Integration  Data Security  Iso 27001  Data Governance  cyberlaw  Security Architecture  Assessing  Cyber-security  Risk Advisory  Cyber Incident Management  Cyber Risk Management  Cisa  Consulting  Data security platforms  Cissp  Data Strategy
column7:
The Team
Our cybersecurity team offer services that enable mission resilience by offering deep cyber expertise, advanced analytics, continuous monitoring, and secure cloud services. Working closely with our clients, we design, build and implement information security strategies and solutions that can help enhance business performance.
The Data Security Manager should be able to understand, communicate, and implement end-to-end data security capabilities such as:
Secure Data Strategy: Embedding security into the overall approach and vision for data in an organization.
Secure Data Governance: Enabling the people & process of an organization to secure the flow of data through the organization.
Secure Data Integration: Incorporating secure technological and business processes to align data from various sources.
Data Protection: Provide immutable capabilities layered on top of data at rest or in motion to secure the contents from unauthorized access.
Data Control: Implementation of technical capabilities such as rights management to enforce the movement or transmission of data.
Data Security in the Cloud: Implementation of technical capabilities to protect and secure data in the cloud.
Database Security: Implementation of technical capabilities to protect and secure structured and unstructured database assets.
Secure Data Analytics: Collection and analysis of business and event data to drive security value and enabling the utilization of data as a business asset.
The Role
Cultivate and maintain relationships with key client stakeholders
Manage large Data Security delivery programs consisting of multiple projects, workstreams, phases, or releases, including financials and staffing
Drive Data Security and Protection security opportunities, including solution planning, deal shaping, estimating, and pricing
Lead Data Security proposal development and sales/marketing collateral
Grow Data Security encryption services/business line
Lead Data Security and Protection strategy, roadmap, and vision definition
Develop new offerings and go to market strategies with data teams
Maintain relationships with technology vendors to develop offerings
Assist in the development of point of view, white papers, industry thought leadership, and produce knowledge capital
The Right Profile
Minimum of 5 years of security architecture experience designing and implementing data security solutions?involving data encryption.
Minimum of 5 years of experience assessing or building programs in data protection: data encryption (FPE), tokenization, masking, and key management
Minimum of 4 years of experience in data encryption solutions within cloud environments (e.g. AWS, Azure, GCP)
Minimum of 4 years of hands-on experience with Data Security vendors, product capabilities, and solutions focus on Data Encryption and not limited to Data Loss Prevention, Data Rights Management, Data Classification, and Data Privacy
Security professional certification such as CISSP, CISM, CISA, CIPP or ISO 27001
Recognized technical certification such as Symantec CSP in Data Protection, Certified McAfee Security Specialist CMSS DLP Focus, Websense Data Security Suite DSS Professional, or Informatica Certified Specialist or Expert
Deep understanding of data encryption with extensive leadership contacts
Deep understanding of privacy/data privacy standards and regulations local, domestic and global (State Level Data Protection, ISO, GAPP, NIST 800-53, HIPAA, HiTrust, Privacy by Design, GDPR, EU Data Protection Directives, APEC Privacy Framework)
About Accenture
Accenture is a global professional services company with leading capabilities in digital, cloud and security. Combining unmatched experience and specialized skills across more than 40 industries, we offer Strategy and Consulting, Interactive, Technology and Operations servicesall powered by the world's largest network of Advanced Technology and Intelligent Operations centres. Our 506,000 people deliver on the promise of technology and human ingenuity every day, serving clients in more than 120 countries. We embrace the power of change to create value and shared success for our clients, people, shareholders, partners and communities. Visit us at www.accenture.com.

Our client is a Cyber Security and Network Solutions Provider and they are looking for the position below:
Security Solutions Engineer - (Ref: TC20210927-PNS03)
Responsibilities:
Provide Presales and post-sales support on PKI security products and solutions to customers and partners.
Provide technical support to tenders submission, including technical compliance, technical solution proposal, bill of material, Proof-of-concept testing, etc.
Prepare technical solution proposals and documentation for turnkey projects.
Evaluate and test security products and technologies for new product and solutions.
Provide professional services on implementing PKI infrastructure which includes HSM, Key Management System, Encryption, Microsoft base Certificate Authority, etc.
Serve as Level 1 to Level 3 support for customers and partners.
Requirements:
Diploma or Degree in IT, Computer Science, Cybersecurity or equivalent.
Experience in designing and implementing PKI Security architecture of multi-vendor infrastructure includes
- Microsoft based Domain Controller, DNS, DHCP, LDAP, RADIUS & AAA servers.
- Microsoft based Certificate Authority, Prime Key EJBCA
- Window/Linux/UNIX OS environments.
- Hardware Security Module (HSM)
- Key Management System (KMS)
- Data encryption applications.
Experience in HSM/KMS integration such as Microsoft CA, MSSQL, VMware, MongoDB & etc will be preferred.
Those we cloud migration experience and cloud certifications will be an advantage
Must have at least 1-2 years of PKI Security and cybersecurity project deployment experience. Those without the relevant work experience but with the right knowledge and keen interest in PKI Security can be considered.
Initiative with good working attitude
Hardworking and eager to learn new technologies and skills
Only Singaporean needs apply.
Benefits
Salary: From $3000 to $4500 (Commensurate to experience)
Work Week: 5 Days
Working Hours: 9am to 6pm

Under the revised Employment Agencies Licence Condition 5(b), employment agencies (EAs) are required to collect the personal data (e.g. NRIC, FIN) of applicants referred to employers for permanent or contract job positions of at least 6 months with a fixed monthly salary of $3,300 and above. PDPA requirements on collection, use and disclosure of personal data are not applicable to EAs that are collecting such information, as it is a regulatory requirement.

column7:
In-Flyt Experience (IFE)
In its business shift, Thales In-Flyt Experience Business Line is massively digitalizing its offers with comprehensive digital in-flight entertainment solutions. Over the past years, while evolving our solution, we have engaged with premier airlines across the globe to ensure we are thoroughly addressing their pain points. In parallel, Thales IFE has engaged with recognized leaders in the consumer world to enrich IFE solutions on proven hardware technologies and software development methodologies from some of the largest digital players. Thales IFE implements a technological shift, by bridging the gap with the consumer world into end-to-end platforms, spanning both on the ground and onboard the aircraft, with the onboard systems are now considered as a simple extension of the ground infrastructure.
Digital Competence Center (DCC)
Thales IFE has decided to create a leading technology center in Singapore for its IFE Digital Engineering. It will leverage on unique digital skillset from Singapore and neighbouring countries on Cloud engineering. Thanks to a multi-year strategic plan, Thales is locating at WeWork@Suntec, a center that will be the Cloud Center of Excellence for Thales IFE Business Line. Initiatives towards public cloud will be lead from Singapore, it covers Site Reliability expertise, Security analysts, and push-to-cloud projects. High-end cloud engineers are expected to be part of such project and rely on agile and modern leadership practices.
Responsibilities:
As a Cybersecurity Leader:
You will drive security cloud posture for IFE cloud workloads
You will technically manage and provide guidance to a team of skilled security engineers
You will lead the resolution of security issues by collecting, analyzing evidences and mitigating incidents
You will drive security monitoring, alerting release and compliance management
Identifying, raising and mitigating security weaknesses on Thales Cloud infrastructure.
Ensuring day-to-day world class support to internal engineering and services teams.
You will provide expert diagnosis and review of the live service and application performance
Requirements:
Experience with identity and access management solutions such AWS IAM or Azure policies
To succeed at this job, you must have a good understanding of public cloud services and DevOps practices
You must have past experiences on Security practices applied Linux based OS
You must have past experience on Python programing language, automation technics (e.g: Chef TerraForm), code versioning like Git, CI/CD chain and monitoring/logging like Splunk
You must be used to manipulate code to improve system availability and latency and to optimize code for stability, functionality and scalability infrastructure
You have to be passionate about Infrastructure as a Code and that think about Server Immutability
Excellent verbal and written communication skills

column7:
Acronis is dedicated not just to cyber protection but to the general protection of its potential and current employees, interviews are being held virtually during the current global COVID-19 situation.
Acronis is a world leader in cyber protectionempowering people by providing them with cutting-edge technology that enables them to monitor, control, and protect the data that their businesses and lives depend on. We are in an exciting phase of rapid-growth and expansion and looking for a Senior Cybersecurity Researcher who is ready to join us in creating a #CyberFit future and protecting the digital world!
We are looking for an Manual/Auto Quality Assurance Engineer to join our team in Singapore office. The QA Engineer will work as a part of growing RnD team working on innovative technologies for the flagship company's products: Acronis Backup, Acronis Cyber Cloud and Acronis True Image. This position is mainly responsible for implementing manual scenarios testing. This involves working collaboratively with multiple teams in different Acronis offices. We are looking for a highly motivated person with strong desire to learn and dig deep and who is just as excited about innovation, technology and quality as we are.
Every member of our A-Team has an instrumental role and impact on the success of Acronis innovative and growing business, so we are looking for someone who enjoys working in dynamic, global teams and thrives in a fast-paced and rapidly changing work environment. Just like everyone at Acronis, the ideal candidate will embody all of our company values: responsive, alert, detail-oriented, makes decisions, and never gives up.
WHAT YOU'LL DO
You will need to understand and analyze product requirements and communicate with product management teams. You will be involved in develop test design of user scenarios, test cases and checklists, prepare test environments, execution of manual functional testing, reporting and processing defects.
You will also be involved in collection of comprehensive and relevant data for problem investigation. You will prepare test analytics for automation scenarios, interact with automation team. Analyze customers issues and investigate their root causes and participate in technical discussions with RnD teams
Implement autotest on Python, extend autotests frameworks in company
WHAT YOU BRING (EXPERIENCE & QUALIFICATIONS)
Bachelor's degree in computer science, IT related field, or equivalent experience
Basic knowledge of Quality Assurance theory: principles, methodologies and techniques
Proficiency in both Linux and Windows operating systems with knowledge in installing, configuring and troubleshooting
Familiar with Virtualization systems (optional)
Analytical mindset, ability to solve complex logical puzzles
Knowledge of basic programming/scripting principles would be an additional advantage
Understanding of basic concepts of computer architecture, data structure and IT security
Python language and test frameworks
WHO WE ARE
Acronis is revolutionizing cyber protection by integrating backup, disaster recovery, storage, next-generation anti-malware, and protection management into one solution. This all-in-one integration removes the complexity and risks associated with non-integrated solutions and offers easy, complete and reliable data protection for all workloads, applications, and systems across any environmentphysical, virtual, cloud, and mobileall at a low cost.
Founded in Singapore in 2003 and incorporated in Switzerland in 2008, Acronis is truly a global organization with more than 1,900 employees in 33 locations in 18 countries. Its solutions are trusted by more than 5.5 million consumers and 500,000 businesses, including 100% of the Fortune 1000 companies. Acronis products are available through 50,000 partners and service providers in over 150 countries in more than 30 languages. Acronis is in an exciting phase of growth and expansion, recently receiving a $250 million investment from CVC Capital Partners, bringing the total valuation to more than $2.5 billion.
Acronis is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, color, marital status, national origin, physical or mental disability, medical condition, protected veteran status, race, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or any other characteristic protected by applicable laws, regulations and ordinances.

column7:
See yourself at Twilio
Join the team as our next Strategic Growth Account Executive, South East Asia!
Who we are & why we're hiring
Twilio powers real-time business communications and data solutions that help companies and developers worldwide build better applications and customer experiences.
Although we're headquartered in San Francisco, we're on a journey to becoming a globally antiracist company that supports diversity, equity & inclusion wherever we do business. We employ thousands of Twilions worldwide, and we're looking for more builders, creators, and visionaries to help fuel our growth momentum.
About the job
Reporting to a Manager, Growth Sales, Rest of Asia, the Strategic Growth Account Executive will play a key role in further growing the business. As our new Strategic Growth Account Executive, you will be responsible for retention, revenue growth, and identification of new joint use cases within key customer accounts across our Growth segment in South East Asia, including some of the most successful startups!
Responsibilities
In this role, you'll:
Acquire new customers and be responsible for driving new revenue for a specific territory while being assigned a quota for net new ARR and maintaining the highest levels of customer satisfaction
Work with customers across all verticals to understand their business and technical requirements.
Understand the capabilities of Twilio's communications API platform so that together you can craft a solution for customers specific use case needs
Work diligently with cross-functional teams in Accounting, Finance, Legal, Pricing, and Operations to design mutually beneficial contracts to address customer requirements and balance the needs of our business
Ability to balance ongoing tasks and prioritise multiple projects/deals at the same time.
Qualifications
Not all applicants will have skills that match a job description exactly. Twilio values diverse experiences in other industries, and we encourage everyone who meets the required qualifications to apply. While having desired qualifications make for a strong candidate, we encourage applicants with alternative experiences to also apply. If your career is just starting or hasn't followed a traditional path, don't let that stop you from considering Twilio. We are always looking for people who will bring something new to the table!
Required:
Several years of experience in solution selling into SMB, Mid-Market or Commercial segments and a track record of personally selling and closing complex solutions (Cloud, SaaS or CPaaS) and closing 6 - 7 figure deals
An understanding of the cloud computing and communications business model.
Demonstrated success by overachieving quota on a consistent basis
Ability to expand and build new relationships with senior line of business owners and executive partners to understand and uncover new opportunities
Comfortable in a high tempo environment with many priorities and have the ability to efficiently handle your own time
Desired:
Previously sold Cloud or B2B Enterprise Software.
Experience of selling to both a business and technical audience and have a passion for a solution and value driven approach to selling
Location
This role will be based in our Singapore office.
What We Offer
There are many benefits to working at Twilio, including, in addition to competitive pay, things like generous time-off, ample parental and wellness leave, healthcare, a retirement savings program, and much more. Offerings vary by location.
Twilio thinks big. Do you
We like to solve problems, take initiative, pitch in when needed, and are always up for trying new things. That's why we seek out colleagues who embody our values something we call Twilio Magic. Additionally, we empower employees to build positive change in their communities by supporting their volunteering and donation efforts.
So, if you're ready to unleash your full potential, do your best work, and be the best version of yourself, apply now!
If this role isn't what you're looking for, please consider other open positions.
Due to the current health crisis related to COVID-19 and the escalating visa / travel restrictions in effect, we may only be extending offers to individuals who (a) are currently physically resident in Singapore, (b) have a legal right to work in Singapore, or (c) candidates who can start in this location by the expected hire date. We're keeping the situation under review and will adjust our position should the restrictive measures be removed later on. Additionally, Twilio will require evidence of vaccination, medical ineligibility for vaccination or recovery from Covid-19 within the past 180 days, for employees going into the office as employees will not be able to access our offices from 15 January 2022 (unless such employee will complete the vaccination by 31 January 2022) without vaccination. In accordance with applicable law, we may also collect evidence of vaccination as a condition of employment for employees who require work passes as of 1 February 2022.
